channel.description: Recent content in zephyr on Holger Schurig's Computer Calisthenics & Orthodontia

item.title: Multi-Board setup for Zephyr
item.description: Why? Here I document how to compile one Zephyr RTOS source-code base against different targets. Why can this be helpful? your EE collegues are cool … but still you need to wait longer than expected for the prototype board. In the meantime, you want to start development on some development board, like Nucleo or Disco some of your logic can be checked via unit-tests — and luckily Zephyr has a test framework built it.
